name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At about 18:00 on November 11, in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, a BMW hit several people and cars at the intersection of Dinglan Road and Danonggang Road in Dingqiao Town, Shangcheng District. According to the police report, a total of 5 people were hit, one of whom was seriously injured and died after failed rescue. The police said the cause of the accident was that Huang Moumou improperly operated the parking and mistakenly stepped on the accelerator instead of the brake, causing the accident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At this moment, many residents in Daya Bay District, Huizhou, Guangdong reported that a large area of unknown yellow smoke appeared in the sky.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A local Zhuhai netizen posted a post describing the incident and its details:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, the owners of Sunac Oriental Court in Xi'an, Shaanxi Province, went to the Xi'an Housing and Urban-Rural Development Bureau again to defend their rights because the property certificates had not been issued to the owners two years after the handover of the houses, and some projects in the community were not completed (underground garages, heating, etc.).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Huizhou Fire Department reported that the production process of Shell Phase II in Daya Bay Petrochemical Zone fluctuated, and the company took emergency measures, so no fire occurred and no casualties were caused.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, Zhuhai Sports Center was closed, with police cars patrolling inside, and some citizens spontaneously came to the scene to send flowers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 11, in Tiaobinshan City, Liaoning Province, the video showed that several people were arguing when a car next to them suddenly started and hit the people in front of them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 11 (Released), Qinzhou, Guangxi. Villagers of Baisha Village, Napeng Town, Qinnan District, confronted urban management and law enforcement officers to protest against the government's occupation of land and forced construction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A BBC reporter was obstructed and pushed by a man while reporting live at the Zhuhai Sports Center.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 6, Trump was elected as the 47th President of the United States, which also sparked heated discussions in the simplified Chinese circle. For this reason, we specially invited six big Vs in the simplified Chinese circle to talk about their views on the US election, as well as their views on a series of policies after Trump took office, Sino-US relations, the Russia-Ukraine war, the Taiwan Strait issue and the future prospects of the United States.
They are senior media person, former Director of the Chinese Department of Voice of America Gong Xiaoxia @Sasha_Gong, former BBC Chinese Editor-in-Chief, Dad Wu @vivianwubeijing, CEO of Dasheng Media, well-known blogger, Sydney Daddy @SydneyDaddy1 who is currently running for state legislator, well-known military blogger Xu Mouren @xumouren_yt, well-known financial blogger Xiao Cui Chats About Finance @cui_news, and everyone's favorite "Seven Steps of Democracy" leader Toronto Square Face...
fullContent:
11月6日，特朗普当选了第47任美国总统，在简体中文圈也掀起了激烈的讨论.为此，我们特别邀请了简中圈的六位大V来聊聊他们对于美国大选的看法，以及他们对的特朗普上台后的一系列政策，中美关系，俄乌战争，台海问题和对美国未来的展望。
 他们分别是 资深媒体人，前美国之音中文部主任龚小夏  @Sasha_Gong ,前BBC中文总编，大声传媒CEO吴薇  @vivianwubeijing ，知名博主，目前正在竞选州议员的悉尼奶爸 @SydneyDaddy1 ,知名军事博主徐某人@xumouren_yt    ，知名财经博主小翠聊财经 @cui_news  ,以及大家最喜欢的“七步民主教”教主多伦多方脸  @Torontobigface 。
欢迎点击链接，收看完整版 《美国大选大家谈 （上）》：川普为什么大胜？如何看待“美国优先”？你最期待哪项政策？民主党的竞选策略出了什么问题？

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, in Fuzhou City, the owners of Zhongfang Wanbao City at the intersection of West Second Ring Road and Industrial Road in Taijiang District collectively defended their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, a police notice about the Zhuhai Sports Center incident was posted at the entrance of Carnegie Mellon University in the United States, as well as a recent notice from Henan University banning night cycling.
